product_name: Keen Bryce Mid WP Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Keen Bryce Mid WP hiking boots provide waterproof protection and nimble support for comfort when tackling your favorite day hike or trekking the world over. Mid-height uppers are made of waterproofed nubuck leather and flexible nylon mesh to provide flexibility, breathability and long-lasting performance. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry while allowing perspiration to dissipate before it saturates the inside of the shoe. Patented rubber Toe Guards protect feet and uppers from impacts and abrasion. Removable, dual-density EVA footbeds combine with KEEN.ZORB strobel boards for excellent shock absorption and step-in comfort. Compression-molded, dual-density EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and padding for all-day comfort. Supportive thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance torsional stability on uneven terrain. The women's Keen Bryce Mid WP hiking boots feature nonmarking rubber outsoles that deliver all-around traction. Fit tip: runs about a 1/2 size small. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Keen Bryce Mid WP hiking boots provide waterproof protection and nimble support for comfort when tackling your favorite day hike or trekking the world over.
